name: Eco Ronin Infinite
description:
A highly unusual third person  roguelike action-adventure 

Contains

  • Fast paced combat and platforming 
  • 3d movement (gliding, grappling) 
  • Sentient AI 
  • Infinite random floors 
  • Puzzle dungeons 
  • Angry shopkeeper
  • Hidden secrets 
  • Hardcore mode 

It's as if Breath of the Wild, Spelunky, NieR Automata, and Celeste all had a baby. 

Fast paced, mysterious, full of secrets and things to explore. 

Warning: Contains fantasy violence and coarse language.
